_sText:
Do battle in a ship's cargo hold with up to 30 players with buy zones for TDM, Bots, etc.
  • Main Deck has transparent, breakable grate sections (300 strength) for dynamic and surprising gameplay.
Multi-Range Engagement Strategies:
For long or short range weapons depending on your level in gungame. (Rush the main deck or go below/above to extend the round with longer range and strategic play)

Multi-Elevation Gameplay:
  1. Observation Decks and Platforms (Ramp & Ladder Access)
  2. Main Deck (Spawn Points)
  3. Gangway (Ramp & Fall Damage Access)
  4. Cargo Hold (Ladder and Increased Fall Damage Access)

Lighting:
  1. Main Deck is exposed to harsh sunlight causing realistic overexposure.
  2. Gangway is lit by some balanced, red emergency lighting.
  3. Cargo Hold has various traditional light sources to keep players identifiable, even in the shadows.
